message:
Hi Stephen,

I'm seeing something unexpected when debugging my Worker Role in Visual Studio when running multiple Tasks inside a single AsyncContext. When I step through the code, after each await statements that triggers I/O the thread id changes. I just found out the same behavior can be observed without debugging (by logging the Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId before and after the await line).

When you say 'true single-threaded context', do you mean that the async code inside the AsyncContext will always be running on one single thread, but the exact thread (id) can change over time? Or am I seeing some odd behavior?

Regards,  
Daniel
